vote.text: Amendment SA 3440 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3440 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S8496; text: CR S8496) To amend the title.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3440 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Mikulski.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3440 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
